snippet: With a mix of entertaining topics and politics, the two-year-old Independent Journal Review has web traffic that exceeds more seasoned right-wing sites.
abstract: Two-year-old conservative website Independent Journal Review, with mix of entertaining topics and politics, has web traffic that exceeds more seasoned right-wing sites; profitable site has roughly 24 million unique visitors a month; its 30 reporters and editors are based in Alexandria, Va.
lead_paragraph: With a mix of entertaining topics and politics, the two-year-old Independent Journal Review has web traffic that exceeds more seasoned right-wing sites.

headline.main: Independent Journal Review Website Becomes a Draw for Conservatives
headline.print_headline: A Young Website Catches the Eyes of Conservatives
